# Lawn and Landscape Maintenance at Lévis Forts National Historic Site

## Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Lawn and Landscape Maintenance services at Lévis Forts National Historic Site.

## Project Description
Parks Canada requires a vendor to provide landscape maintenance services at Lévis Forts National Historic Site. The services will include, but are not limited to, lawn mowing and trimming, weeding, edging, lawn aeration, leaf removal, and mowing of overgrown areas. The work will be performed on an approximately 44,600 square meter area, including all grassed and fallow areas, paved areas, flowerbeds, and related structures.

## Contract Period
The contract period will be from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2027, inclusive. The contract term may be extended by one to two additional periods, each of one year, under the same conditions.

## Site Visit
It is highly recommended that bidders visit the worksite to gain a better understanding of the project. A site visit has been scheduled for January 17, 2024, at 41 Chemin du Gouvernement, Lévis, QC G6V 7B1, at 10:00 EST.

## Bid Instructions
Bids must be submitted in writing in either English or French, along with documents in both official languages. Bidders must communicate with the contracting authority by January 16, 2024, at 14:00 EST, to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend. Bidders must complete and submit the required certification for site visit participation.

## Late Bid Submissions
Only bids received by the contracting authority via fax or email will be considered official. In-person or courier submissions will not be accepted, except for the site visit arrangements.

## Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications regarding this RFP, please contact:

Helene Periard
helene.periard@pc.gc.ca
1-873-355-3504

## License and Certification
Bidders must hold all necessary licenses and certifications, as required by the National Parks Regulations.

## Submission Deadline
Bids must be submitted no later than January 31, 2024, at 14:00 EST.
